subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Damian Cunego of Italy won the 14th stage of the Vuelta a España, and Alejandro Valverde of Spain added to his overall lead by finishing fifth in La Pandera.
snippet: Damian Cunego of Italy won the 14th stage of the Vuelta a España, and Alejandro Valverde of Spain added to his overall lead by finishing fifth in La Pandera.
